articles.author: JC Gotinga, Alastair McCready, JC Gotinga
articles.title: Teenager With Autism Sentenced to Prison Over Social Media Posts
articles.description: A 16-year-old with autism has been jailed for criticizing the government in a Telegram group, in a case highlighting the rapid deterioration of free speech in Cambodia.
articles.content:
An argument erupting over politics and memes mocking political leaders in a group chat is generally a low-stakes affair between friends. That is, unless it occurs in Cambodia.
The dangers of venting… [+4493 chars]
